modShortDescription: This mod stacks all items that are stackable (not most blocks) to 30K. Compatible with Alpha 19.
modDescription:
This mod [stacks](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-stack-size/) all items that are stackable (not most blocks) to 30K. Compatible with Alpha 19.

**[Download](http://cdgroup.org/files/7dtd/30kStacks.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8777-lucs-modlet-collection-quality-bonuses-better-stamina-terrain-mv-spd-etc/).

**Credits:** [Luc](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/luc/)
